overview:
Accomplished IT applications professional with 15 yearsâ€™ experience in all aspects of online marketing including software development, strategic advisor, subject matter expert in new business development, and client facing liasion . Combine strong technical skills with broad marketing knowledge for online / e-commerce architecture development and marketing abilities. Skillset includes ColdFusion 8, SQL; T-SQL; social networking; SEM/PPC, interactive media, website content management with graphical and user interface design; search engine optimization and analysis, including marketing strategies; email marketing; and subscription-based products and services. Also very strong in project and resource management skills, team leadership, systems evaluation, negotiation and influencing, business strategy, client and agency relationship building.

Other Information: ————————— Featured in St. Pete Times TBT “Living the Tweet life” http://www.tampabay.com/features/popculture/article987343.ece Featured on Fox News: http://www.myfoxtampabay.com/dpp/entertainment/scienceandtech/twitteraquarium050409 Strategic visionary behind SaveTheTortillas.com (now de-activated per court order); challenged legal system and first amendment rights with social media to save local business. Featured on all local news and print channels including The DayTime Show. Personally been featured on Mashable for TweepleTwak.com website and vision; Mashable article available here: http://mashable.com/2008/10/29/tweeple-twak/ American Marketing Association March ‘09 member publication mention for my Twitter app work and vision Co-Founder of Bar Camp Tampa bay
